<current_file>
```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/example/fintechspender/MainActivity.kt, lines=ALL(1-48)
package com.example.fintechspender

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.padding
import androidx.compose.material3.Scaffold
import androidx.compose.material3.Text
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview
import com.example.fintechspender.ui.theme.FintechspenderTheme

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 FintechspenderTheme {
 Scaffold(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) { innerPadding ->
 Greeting(
 name = "Android",
 modifier = Modifier.padding(innerPadding)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun Greeting(name: String, modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 Text(
 text = "Hello $name!",
 modifier = modifier
 )
}

@Preview(showBackground = true)
@Composable
fun GreetingPreview() {
 FintechspenderTheme {
 Greeting("Android")
 }
}
```
</current_file>
</additional_data>
<user_query>
create the UI for an app with a purple background

[file] app\src\main\res\layout\activity_main.xml (289B, 6 lines) - Nov 08, 2025 11:12 am"},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01QDtdHFgRvnyzCG9Bos72z1","content":"package com.example.fintechspender.ui.theme

import android.app.Activity
import android.os.Build
import androidx.compose.foundation.isSystemInDarkTheme
import androidx.compose.material3.MaterialTheme
import androidx.compose.material3.darkColorScheme
import androidx.compose.material3.dynamicDarkColorScheme
import androidx.compose.material3.dynamicLightColorScheme
import androidx.compose.material3.lightColorScheme
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext

private val DarkColorScheme = darkColorScheme(
 primary = Purple80,
 secondary = PurpleGrey80,
 tertiary = Pink80
)

private val LightColorScheme = lightColorScheme(
 primary = Purple40,
 secondary = PurpleGrey40,
 tertiary = Pink40

 /* Other default colors to override
 background = Color(0xFFFFFBFE),
 surface = Color(0xFFFFFBFE),
 onPrimary = Color.White,
 onSecondary = Color.White,
 onTertiary = Color.White,
 onBackground = Color(0xFF1C1B1F),
 onSurface = Color(0xFF1C1B1F),
 */
)

@Composable
fun FintechspenderTheme(
 darkTheme: Boolean = isSystemInDarkTheme(),
 // Dynamic color is available on Android 12+
 dynamicColor: Boolean = true,
 content: @Composable () -> Unit
) {
 val colorScheme = when {
 dynamicColor && Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S -> {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 if (darkTheme) dynamicDarkColorScheme(context) else dynamicLightColorScheme(context)
 }

 darkTheme -> DarkColorScheme
 else -> LightColorScheme
 }

 MaterialTheme(
 colorScheme = colorScheme,
 typography = Typography,
 content = content
 )
}"},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01GaaRjF1cHBjmYg4urV6jCF","content":"package com.example.fintechspender.ui.theme

val Pink40 = Color(0xFF7D5260)"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":""}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01GDx9qtwFmteaPuJUkMkMRH","type":"function","function":{"name":"read_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/src/main/res/layout/activity_main.xml"}"}},{"id":"toolu_bdrk_019gcYWevS3acaBH3EFbU5fw","type":"function","function":{"name":"read_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/src/main/java/com/example/fintechspender/ui/theme/Type.kt"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01GDx9qtwFmteaPuJUkMkMRH","content":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontFamily
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp

// Set of Material typography styles to start with
val Typography = Typography(
 bodyLarge = TextStyle(
 fontFamily = FontFamily.Default,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal,
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 lineHeight = 24.sp,

 ),

 )
 */
)"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now I understand the project structure. I can see there's both a traditional XML layout and Compose setup. +@Composable
+fun QuickActionItem(action: QuickAction) {
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier.size(80.dp),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(16.dp),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = VeryLightPurple)
+ ) {
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
+ horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.Center
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = action.icon,
+ contentDescription = action.label,
+ tint = DeepPurple,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
+ )
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ Text(
+ text = action.label,
+ fontSize = 10.sp,
+ color = DeepPurple,
+ textAlign = TextAlign.Center
+ )
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun RecentTransactionsCard() {
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(16.dp),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = VeryLightPurple)
+ ) {
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(20.dp)
+ ) {
+ Text(
+ text = "Recent Transactions",
+ fontSize = 18.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = DeepPurple
+ )
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
+
+ transactions.forEach { transaction ->
+ TransactionItem(transaction)
+ if (transaction != transactions.last()) {
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(12.dp))
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun TransactionItem(transaction: Transaction) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ Box(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .size(40.dp)
+ .clip(CircleShape)
+ .background(DeepPurple),
+ contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = transaction.icon,
+ contentDescription = transaction.title,
+ tint = White,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
+ )
+ }
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))
+ Column {
+ Text(
+ text = transaction.title,
+ fontSize = 14.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
+ color = DarkGray
+ )
+ Text(
+ text = transaction.subtitle,
+ fontSize = 12.sp,
+ color = MediumGray
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ Text(
+ text = transaction.amount,
+ fontSize = 14.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = if (transaction.amount.startsWith("+")) Success else DarkGray
+ )
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun AccountsScreen() {
+ LazyColumn(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxSize()
+ .padding(16.dp),
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
+ ) {
+ item {
+ Text(
+ text = "My Accounts",
+ fontSize = 24.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = White
+ )
+ }
+ items(accounts) { account ->
+ AccountCard(account)
+ }
+ }
+}
+

+fun AccountCard(account: Account) {

+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(16.dp),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = VeryLightPurple)
+ ) {
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(20.dp)
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ Column {
+ Text(
+ text = account.name,
+ fontSize = 16.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = DeepPurple
+ )
+ Text(
+ text = account.type,
+ fontSize = 14.sp,
+ color = MediumGray
+ )
+ }
+ Text(
+ text = account.balance,
+ fontSize = 18.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = DeepPurple
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+

# androidx.compose.material.icons
Common/All

This is the entry point for using Material Icons in Compose, designed to provide icons that match those described at [fonts.google.com/icons](https://fonts.google.com/icons).

![Icons image](https://developer.android.com/images/reference/androidx/compose/material/icons/iconography.png)

In this page, you'll find documentation for types, properties, and functions available in the `androidx.compose.material.icons` package.

The most commonly used set of Material icons are provided by `androidx.compose.material:material-icons-core` \- this library is also provided as an API dependency by `androidx.compose.material:material`.

A separate library, `androidx.compose.material:material-icons-extended`, contains the full set of Material icons. Due to the very large size of this library, make sure to use R8/Proguard to strip unused icons if you are including this library as a direct dependency. Alternatively you can make a local copy (by copy and pasting) the icon(s) you wish to keep, or using Android Studio's 'Import vector asset' feature.

## Objects
| | | |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `Icons` | [Material Design system icons](https://material.io/design/iconography/system-icons.html) as seen on [Google Fonts](https://fonts.google.com/icons). | Cmn |
| `Icons.AutoMirrored` | [Material Design system icons](https://material.io/design/iconography/system-icons.html) as seen on [Google Fonts](https://fonts.google.com/icons). | Cmn |
| `Icons.AutoMirrored.Filled` | [Filled icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=baseline) are the default icon theme. | Cmn |
| `Icons.AutoMirrored.Outlined` | [Outlined icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=outline) make use of a thin stroke and empty space inside for a lighter appearance. | Cmn |
| `Icons.AutoMirrored.Rounded` | [Rounded icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=round) use a corner radius that pairs well with brands that use heavier typography, curved logos, or circular elements to express their style. | Cmn |
| `Icons.AutoMirrored.Sharp` | [Sharp icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=sharp) display corners with straight edges, for a crisp style that remains legible even at smaller scales. | Cmn |
| `Icons.AutoMirrored.TwoTone` | [Two-Tone icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=twotone) display corners with straight edges, for a crisp style that remains legible even at smaller scales. | Cmn |
| `Icons.Filled` | [Filled icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=baseline) (previously the only available theme, also known as the baseline theme) are the default icon theme. | Cmn |
| `Icons.Outlined` | [Outlined icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=outline) make use of a thin stroke and empty space inside for a lighter appearance. | Cmn |
| `Icons.Rounded` | [Rounded icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=round) use a corner radius that pairs well with brands that use heavier typography, curved logos, or circular elements to express their style. | Cmn |
| `Icons.Sharp` | [Sharp icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=sharp) display corners with straight edges, for a crisp style that remains legible even at smaller scales. | Cmn |
| `Icons.TwoTone` | [Two-Tone icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/?style=twotone) display corners with straight edges, for a crisp style that remains legible even at smaller scales. | Cmn |

# Material icons

Stay organized with collections
Save and categorize content based on your preferences.

The `Icon` composable is a convenient way to draw a single color icon on screen
that follows [Material Design guidelines](https://material.io/design/iconography/system-icons.html#grid-and-keyline-shapes). To use `Icon`, include
the [Compose Material](https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/compose-material) library (or the [Compose Material 3](https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/compose-material3) library).

For example, if you had a vector drawable that you wanted to load up with
Material defaults, you can use the `Icon` composable as follows:

```
Icon(
painter=painterResource(R.drawable.baseline_directions_bus_24),
contentDescription=stringResource(id=R.string.bus_content_description)
)
MaterialIconsSnippets.kt
```

By default, the `Icon` composable is tinted with `LocalContentColor.current` and
is `24.dp` in size. It also exposes a `tint` color parameter (which leverages
the same mechanism for tinting as described in the [Image tint](https://developer.android.com/develop/ui/compose/graphics/images/customize#tint-image) section).
The `Icon` composable is intended for use for small icon elements. You
should use the `Image` composable for more customization options.

The [Material Icon library](https://developer.android.com/reference/kotlin/androidx/compose/material/icons/package-summary) also includes a set of predefined `Icons` that
can be used in Compose without needing to import an SVG manually. To draw the
rounded version of the [shopping cart\
icon](https://fonts.google.com/icons?icon.query=shopping+cart):

```
Icon(
Icons.Rounded.ShoppingCart,
contentDescription=stringResource(id=R.string.shopping_cart_content_desc)
)
MaterialIconsSnippets.kt
```

![Shopping cart vector with Icon](https://developer.android.com/static/develop/ui/compose/images/graphics-shopping.png)**Figure 1**: Shopping cart vector with Icon

It's worth noting that it's not required to use `Icon` to render a
`VectorDrawable` on screen, under the hood, `Icon` uses
`Modifier.paint(painterResource(R.drawable.ic_bus_stop)`) to draw the `Icon` on
screen. For more information on all the available icons, take a look at the
[Icons documentation](https://developer.android.com/reference/kotlin/androidx/compose/material/icons/package-summary).

## AI-generated Key Takeaways
outlined\_flag

- Material design system icons are simple, modern, friendly, and sometimes quirky icons optimized for display on all common platforms and display resolutions.

- The icons are available for free under the Apache License Version 2.0 and can be used in various project types.

- You can browse and download individual icons in SVG or PNG format from the Material Icons Library or download the entire set from a zip archive or the Git repository.

- For web projects, the icon font is the easiest and most efficient method to incorporate icons, serving over 900 icons from a single small file and styled entirely with CSS.

- The icons can be used in HTML with ligatures for modern browsers or numeric character references for older browsers and can be easily styled for size and color according to material design guidelines.


An overview of material iconswhere to get them and how to integrate them with your projects.

# https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/compose-material

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Platform
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Android Studio
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Google Play
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Jetpack
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Overview
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Get Started
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Libraries
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Compose
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Community
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kotlin
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Docs
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Games
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Stay organized with collections
 
 
 
 Save and categorize content based on your preferences.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Build Jetpack Compose UIs with ready to use Material Design Components. This is the higher level entry point of Compose, designed to provide components that match those described at www.material.io.
 
 
 
 Latest Update 
 Stable Release 
 Release Candidate 
 Beta Release 
 Alpha Release 
 
 January 25, 2023 
 1.3.1 
 - 
 - 
 1.4.0-alpha05 
 
 
 Structure 
 Compose is combination of 7 Maven Group Ids within androidx. Each Group
contains a targeted subset of functionality, each with its own set of release
notes. 
 This table explains the groups and links to each set of release notes. 
 
 
 Group Description 
 
 
 
 compose.animation Build animations in their Jetpack Compose applications to enrich the user experience. 
 
 
 compose.compiler Transform @Composable functions and enable optimizations with a Kotlin compiler plugin. 
 
 
 compose.foundation Write Jetpack Compose applications with ready to use building blocks and extend foundation to build your own design system pieces. 
 
 
 compose.material Build Jetpack Compose UIs with ready to use Material Design Components. This is the higher level entry point of Compose, designed to provide components that match those described at www.material.io. 
 
 
 compose.material3 Build Jetpack Compose UIs with Material Design 3 Components, the next evolution of Material Design. Material 3 includes updated theming and components and Material You personalization features like dynamic color, and is designed to be cohesive with the new Android 12 visual style and system UI. 
 
 
 compose.runtime Fundamental building blocks of Compose's programming model and state management, and core runtime for the Compose Compiler Plugin to target. 
 
 
 compose.ui Fundamental components of compose UI needed to interact with the device, including layout, drawing, and input. 
 
 
 
 Declaring dependencies 
 To add a dependency on Compose, you must add the Google Maven repository to your
project. Read Google's Maven repository 
for more information. 
 Add the dependencies for the artifacts you need in the build.gradle file for
your app or module: 
 Groovy 
 dependencies {
 implementation "androidx.compose.material:material:1.3.1"
}
android {
 buildFeatures {
 compose true
 }
 composeOptions {
 kotlinCompilerExtensionVersion = "1.4.0"
 }
 kotlinOptions {
 jvmTarget = "1.8"
 }
}
 
 Kotlin 
 dependencies {
 implementation("androidx.compose.material:material:1.3.1")
}
android {
 buildFeatures {
 compose = true
 }
 composeOptions {
 kotlinCompilerExtensionVersion = "1.4.0"
 }
 kotlinOptions {
 jvmTarget = "1.8"
 }
}
 
 
 For more information about dependencies, see Add build dependencies. 
 Feedback 
 Your feedback helps make Jetpack better. Let us know if you discover new issues or have
ideas for improving this library. Please take a look at the
 existing issues 
in this library before you create a new one. You can add your vote to an existing issue by
clicking the star button. 
 Create a new issue 
 See the Issue Tracker documentation 
for more information.

`implementation "androidx.compose.material:material-icons-extended:$compose_version"` is included on my `build.graddle` file with the latest stable realease of Compose (1.1.1).

However, I am unable to reference any of the NetworkWifiXBar icons (e.g. NetworkWifi1Bar ) as seen [here](https://fonts.google.com/icons?icon.style=Rounded&icon.set=Material%20Icons&icon.query=network%20wifi).

I had the understanding that all icons were included with `material-icons-extended`.

Is this an issue on my end or are these not included?

@@ -1,1 +1,112 @@
+# Fintech Spender App
 
+A modern fintech mobile application built with **Jetpack Compose** featuring a beautiful *
+*purple-themed UI** and comprehensive financial management features.
+
+## Features
+
+### Design
+
+- **Purple-themed UI** with modern Material Design 3 components
+- **Gradient backgrounds** and smooth animations
+- **Card-based layout** for better information hierarchy
+- **Responsive design** that works across different screen sizes
+
+### Financial Features
+
+- **Dashboard Overview** with total balance display
+- **Account Management** with multiple account types
+- **Transaction History** with categorized transactions
+- **Quick Actions** for common financial operations
+- **Investment Portfolio** tracking and management
+- **User Profile** management
+
+### Technical Features
+
+- Built with **Jetpack Compose** for modern Android UI
+- **Material Design 3** components and theming
+- **Custom purple color scheme** throughout the app
+- **Bottom navigation** with 4 main sections
+- **Lazy loading** for efficient scrolling
+- **State management** with Compose state
+
+## App Structure
+
+### Navigation Tabs
+
+1. **Home** - Dashboard with balance, quick actions, and recent transactions
+2. **Accounts** - View and manage different financial accounts
+3. **Invest** - Investment portfolio and opportunities
+4. **Profile** - User settings and account information
+
+### Color Scheme
+
+- **Primary Purple**: `#6A1B9A`
+- **Deep Purple**: `#4A148C`
+- **Light Purple**: `#E1BEE7`
+- **Accent Colors**: Success green, warning orange, error red
+
+## Screenshots
+
+The app features:
+
+- Welcome card with personalized greeting
+- Balance display with growth indicators
+- Quick action buttons for common tasks
+- Recent transactions with icons and amounts
+- Account overview with balances
+- Investment opportunities section
+- User profile with avatar
+
+## Getting Started
+
+### Prerequisites
+
+- Android Studio Arctic Fox or later
+- Android SDK 24+
+- Kotlin 1.8+
+
+### Installation
+
+1. Clone the repository
+2. Open in Android Studio
+3. Build and run on device or emulator
+
+### Dependencies
+
+- Jetpack Compose BOM
+- Material Design 3
+- Material Icons Extended
+- Activity Compose
+- Lifecycle Runtime
+
+## Architecture
+
+The app follows modern Android development practices:
+
+- **MVVM pattern** ready for implementation
+- **Compose-first** UI development
+- **Material Design 3** theming system
+- **Modular structure** for easy maintenance
+
+## Customization
+
+The purple theme can be easily customized by modifying the colors in:
+
+```kotlin
+app/src/main/java/com/example/fintechspender/ui/theme/Color.kt
+```
+
+## Future Enhancements
+
+- Integration with real banking APIs
+- Biometric authentication
+- Push notifications for transactions
+- Expense categorization and budgeting
+- Investment recommendations
+- Dark mode support
+- Multi-language support
+
+## License
+
+This project is open source and available under the MIT License.
```

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun FintechApp() {
 var selectedTab by remember { mutableIntStateOf(0) }

 var weeklyBudget by remember { mutableFloatStateOf(0f) }
 var transactions by remember { mutableStateOf(listOf<Transaction>()) }
 var regrets by remember { mutableStateOf(listOf<Regret>()) }

 val totalExpenditure = remember(transactions) { transactions.sumOf { it.amount.toDouble() }.toFloat() }
 val remainingBudget = weeklyBudget - totalExpenditure

 Scaffold(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 bottomBar = {
 BottomAppBar(containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary, contentColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimary) {
 BottomNavigationItem(icon = Icons.Default.Home, label = "Home", selected = selectedTab == 0) { selectedTab = 0 }
 BottomNavigationItem(icon = Icons.Default.Warning, label = "Regret Log", selected = selectedTab == 1) { selectedTab = 1 }
 BottomNavigationItem(icon = Icons.Default.Chat, label = "Chatbot", selected = selectedTab == 2) { selectedTab = 2 }
 BottomNavigationItem(icon = Icons.Default.Person, label = "Profile", selected = selectedTab == 3) { selectedTab = 3 }
 }
 }
 ) { innerPadding ->
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(Color.White)
 .padding(innerPadding)
 ) {
 when (selectedTab) {
 0 -> HomeScreen(
 transactions = transactions,
 totalExpenditure = totalExpenditure,
 remainingBudget = remainingBudget,
 onAddExpense = { newTransaction -> transactions = transactions + newTransaction },
 onEditExpense = { old, new -> transactions = transactions.map { if (it == old) new else it } },
 onSetBudget = { newBudget -> weeklyBudget = newBudget },
 weeklyBudget = weeklyBudget,
 onAddRegret = { newRegret -> regrets = regrets + newRegret }
 )
 1 -> RegretLogScreen(regrets = regrets)
 2 -> ChatbotScreen()
 3 -> ProfileScreen()
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun RowScope.BottomNavigationItem(icon: ImageVector, label: String, selected: Boolean, onClick: () -> Unit) {
 IconButton(onClick = onClick, modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)) {
 Column(horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally) {
 Icon(imageVector = icon, contentDescription = label, tint = if (selected) MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimary else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurface)
 Text(text = label, fontSize = 10.sp, color = if (selected) MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimary else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurface)
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun HomeScreen(
 transactions: List<Transaction>,
 totalExpenditure: Float,
 remainingBudget: Float,
 onAddExpense: (Transaction) -> Unit,
 onEditExpense: (Transaction, Transaction) -> Unit,
 onSetBudget: (Float) -> Unit,
 weeklyBudget: Float,
 onAddRegret: (Regret) -> Unit
) {
 var showAddExpenseDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var showSetBudgetDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var showChallengeDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var showEmergencyDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var showNotEnoughFundsDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var pendingExpense by remember { mutableStateOf<Pair<String, Float>?>(null) }
 var expenseToEdit by remember { mutableStateOf<Transaction?>(null) }

 if (showAddExpenseDialog) {
 AddExpenseDialog(
 onDismiss = { showAddExpenseDialog = false },
 onConfirm = { name, amount ->
 if (amount > remainingBudget) {
 showAddExpenseDialog = false
 showNotEnoughFundsDialog = true
 } else {
 showAddExpenseDialog = false
 if (weeklyBudget > 0 && amount > (weeklyBudget * 0.3f)) {
 pendingExpense = name to amount
 showChallengeDialog = true
 } else {
 val newTransaction = Transaction(
 Icons.Default.ShoppingCart,
 name,
 "Today, ${SimpleDateFormat("h:mm a", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date())}",
 amount
 )
 onAddExpense(newTransaction)
 }
 }
 }
 )
 }

 if (expenseToEdit != null) {
 EditExpenseDialog(
 transaction = expenseToEdit!!,
 onDismiss = { expenseToEdit = null },
 onConfirm = { newName, newAmount ->
 val originalTransaction = expenseToEdit!!
 val difference = newAmount - originalTransaction.amount
 if (difference > remainingBudget) {
 showNotEnoughFundsDialog = true
 } else {
 val updatedTransaction = originalTransaction.copy(title = newName, amount = newAmount)
 onEditExpense(originalTransaction, updatedTransaction)
 }
 expenseToEdit = null
 }
 )
 }

 if (showChallengeDialog) {
 FinancialLiteracyChallengeDialog(
 onDismiss = {
 showChallengeDialog = false
 pendingExpense?.let { (name, amount) -> onAddRegret(Regret(name, amount)) }
 pendingExpense = null
 },
 onComplete = {
 showChallengeDialog = false
 pendingExpense?.let { (name, amount) ->
 val newTransaction = Transaction(
 Icons.Default.ShoppingCart,
 name,
 "Today, ${SimpleDateFormat("h:mm a", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date())}",
 amount
 )
 onAddExpense(newTransaction)
 }
 pendingExpense = null
 },
 onEmergencyClick = {
 showChallengeDialog = false
 showEmergencyDialog = true
 }
 )
 }

 if (showEmergencyDialog) {
 EmergencyDialog(
 onDismiss = {
 showEmergencyDialog = false
 pendingExpense?.let { (name, amount) -> onAddRegret(Regret(name, amount)) }
 pendingExpense = null
 },
 onConfirm = { reason ->
 showEmergencyDialog = false
 pendingExpense?.let { (_, amount) ->
 val emergencyTransaction = Transaction(
 Icons.Default.Warning,
 "Emergency: $reason",
 "Today, ${SimpleDateFormat("h:mm a", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date())}",
 amount
 )
 onAddExpense(emergencyTransaction)
 }
 pendingExpense = null
 }
 )
 }

 if (showNotEnoughFundsDialog) {
 NotEnoughFundsDialog(onDismiss = { showNotEnoughFundsDialog = false })
 }

 if (showSetBudgetDialog) {
 SetBudgetDialog(
 onDismiss = { showSetBudgetDialog = false },
 onSetBudget = { amount ->
 onSetBudget(amount)
 showSetBudgetDialog = false
 }
 )
 }

 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 item { WelcomeCard() }
 item { FinancialSummaryCard(totalExpenditure, remainingBudget) { showSetBudgetDialog = true } }
 item { QuickActionsRow { showAddExpenseDialog = true } }
 item { RecentTransactionsCard(transactions, onTransactionClick = { expenseToEdit = it }) }
 }
}

@Composable
fun EditExpenseDialog(
 transaction: Transaction,
 onDismiss: () -> Unit,
 onConfirm: (name: String, amount: Float) -> Unit
) {
 var name by remember { mutableStateOf(transaction.title) }
 var amount by remember { mutableStateOf(transaction.amount.toString()) }

 AlertDialog(
 onDismissRequest = onDismiss,
 title = { Text("Edit Expense") },
 text = {
 Column {
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = name,
 onValueChange = { name = it },
 label = { Text("Expense Name") }
 )
 Spacer(Modifier.height(8.dp))
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = amount,
 onValueChange = { amount = it },
 label = { Text("Amount") },
 keyboardOptions = KeyboardOptions(keyboardType = KeyboardType.Number)
 )
 }
 },
 confirmButton = {
 Button(
 onClick = {
 val amountFloat = amount.toFloatOrNull()
 if (name.isNotBlank() && amountFloat != null) {
 onConfirm(name, amountFloat)
 }
 }
 ) { Text("Save Changes") }
 },
 dismissButton = { TextButton(onClick = onDismiss) { Text("Cancel") } }
 )
}

@Composable
fun NotEnoughFundsDialog(onDismiss: () -> Unit) {
 val infiniteTransition = rememberInfiniteTransition(label = "infinite_transition")
 val alpha by infiniteTransition.animateFloat(
 initialValue = 0f,
 targetValue = 1f,
 animationSpec = infiniteRepeatable(
 animation = tween(500, easing = LinearEasing),
 repeatMode = RepeatMode.Reverse
 ), label = "alpha_animation"
 )

 AlertDialog(
 onDismissRequest = onDismiss,
 title = { Text("Not Enough Funds") },
 text = {
 Column(horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally, modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()) {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Warning,
 contentDescription = "Warning",
 tint = Color.Red.copy(alpha = alpha),
 modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp)
 )
 Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
 Text("You do not have enough funds for this expense.")
 }
 },
 confirmButton = {
 Button(onClick = onDismiss) {
 Text("OK")
 }
 }
 )
}

fun EmergencyDialog(onDismiss: () -> Unit, onConfirm: (reason: String) -> Unit) {

 }
 },
 confirmButton = {
 Button(
 onClick = {

 onConfirm(reason)
 }
 }
 ) { Text("Submit") }
 },
 dismissButton = { TextButton(onClick = onDismiss) { Text("Cancel") } }
 )
}

@Composable
fun FinancialLiteracyChallengeDialog(
 onDismiss: () -> Unit,
 onComplete: () -> Unit,
 onEmergencyClick: () -> Unit
) {
 val questions by remember { mutableStateOf(allFinancialQuestions.shuffled().take(3)) }
 var currentQuestionIndex by remember { mutableIntStateOf(0) }
 var selectedOptionIndex by remember { mutableStateOf<Int?>(null) }
 val currentQuestion = questions[currentQuestionIndex]
 val isAnswerCorrect = selectedOptionIndex == currentQuestion.correctAnswerIndex

 AlertDialog(
 onDismissRequest = onDismiss,
 title = { Text("AI-Powered Financial Challenge") },
 text = {
 Column {
 Text("This expense is over 30% of your budget. Let's take a moment to reflect.")
 Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
 Text(currentQuestion.questionText, fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold)
 Spacer(Modifier.height(8.dp))
 currentQuestion.options.forEachIndexed { index, option ->
 Button(
 onClick = {
 if (index == currentQuestion.correctAnswerIndex) {
 selectedOptionIndex = index
 } else {
 onDismiss() // Abort if wrong
 }
 },
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 colors = ButtonDefaults.buttonColors(
 containerColor = if (selectedOptionIndex == index) Success.copy(alpha = 0.5f) else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.surface
 )
 ) { Text(option) }
 Spacer(Modifier.height(4.dp))
 }
 Spacer(Modifier.height(8.dp))
 LinearProgressIndicator(
 (currentQuestionIndex.toFloat() + 1) / questions.size,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }
 },
 confirmButton = {
 Button(
 enabled = isAnswerCorrect,
 onClick = {
 if (currentQuestionIndex < questions.size - 1) {
 currentQuestionIndex++
 selectedOptionIndex = null // Reset for next question
 } else {
 onComplete()
 }
 }
 ) { Text(if (currentQuestionIndex < questions.size - 1) "Next Question" else "Proceed with Expense") }
 },
 dismissButton = {
 Row(horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)) {
 TextButton(onClick = onDismiss) { Text("Abort Expense") }
 TextButton(onClick = onEmergencyClick) { Text("Emergency") }
 }
 }
 )
}

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun QuickActionItem(action: QuickAction, onClick: () -> Unit) {
 val interactionSource = remember { MutableInteractionSource() }
 val isPressed by interactionSource.collectIsPressedAsState()
 val brush = Brush.verticalGradient(listOf(
 animateColorAsState(
 if (isPressed) MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.surface,
 label = "start"
 ).value,
 animateColorAsState(
 if (isPressed) MaterialTheme.colorScheme.surface else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary,
 label = "end"
 ).value
 ))

 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.size(80.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(16.dp),
 onClick = onClick,
 interactionSource = interactionSource,
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = Color.Transparent)
 ) {
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(brush),
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.Center,
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Icon(action.icon, action.label, tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary, modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp))
 Spacer(Modifier.height(4.dp))
 Text(action.label, fontSize = 10.sp, color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary, textAlign = TextAlign.Center)
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun ChatbotScreen() {
 var messages by remember {
 mutableStateOf(
 listOf(
 ChatMessage(
 "Hello! I'm your AI financial assistant. How can I help you today?",
 false
 )
 )
 )
 }
 var userInput by remember { mutableStateOf("") }

 Column(modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(16.dp)) {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
 ) {
 items(messages) { message ->
 ChatMessageItem(message)
 }
 }

 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(top = 8.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = userInput,
 onValueChange = { userInput = it },
 label = { Text("Ask something...") },
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 )
 Spacer(Modifier.width(8.dp))
 IconButton(onClick = {
 if (userInput.isNotBlank()) {
 val userMessage = ChatMessage(userInput, true)
 val botResponse = getBotResponse(userInput)
 messages = messages + userMessage + botResponse
 userInput = ""
 }
 }) {

@Composable
fun ChatMessageItem(message: ChatMessage) {
 val alignment = if (message.isFromUser) Alignment.CenterEnd else Alignment.CenterStart
 val backgroundColor = if (message.isFromUser) MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.surface
 val textColor = if (message.isFromUser) MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimary else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurface

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 contentAlignment = alignment
 ) {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.widthIn(max = 300.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(16.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = backgroundColor)
 ) {
 Text(
 text = message.text,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(12.dp),
 color = textColor
 )
 }
 }
}

fun getBotResponse(userInput: String): ChatMessage {
 val response = when {
 "budget" in userInput.lowercase() -> "A budget helps you track your income and expenses. It's a great tool for managing your money!"
 "saving" in userInput.lowercase() -> "Saving money is important for future goals and emergencies. Try to set aside a portion of your income regularly."
 "debt" in userInput.lowercase() -> "Debt can be managed by paying off high-interest loans first. Creating a repayment plan is a good first step."
 "invest" in userInput.lowercase() -> "Investing can help your money grow over time. Consider a diversified portfolio to manage risk."
 else -> "I'm still learning, but I can help with topics like budgeting, saving, debt, and investing. Try asking about one of those!"
 }
 return ChatMessage(response, false)
}

+package com.example.fintechspender.ai
 
+import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName
+
+// Data models for AI analysis
+data class TransactionAnalysisRequest(
+ val merchantName: String,
+ val amount: Float,
+ val userBudget: Float,
+ val recentTransactions: List<String>,
+ val timeOfDay: String,
+ val dayOfWeek: String
+)
+
+data class TransactionAnalysisResponse(
+ val isImpulsive: Boolean,
+ val impulsiveScore: Float, // 0.0 to 1.0
+ val merchantType: MerchantType,
+ val riskLevel: RiskLevel,
+ val questions: List<AIQuestion>,
+ val reasoning: String,
+ val alternatives: List<String>
+)
+
+data class AIQuestion(
+ val questionText: String,
+ val questionType: QuestionType,
+ val expectedAnswers: List<String>?,
+ val isRequired: Boolean = true
+)
+
+enum class QuestionType {
+ YES_NO,
+ MULTIPLE_CHOICE,
+ TEXT_INPUT,
+ REFLECTION
+}
+
+enum class MerchantType(val displayName: String, val riskMultiplier: Float) {
+ GROCERY("Grocery Store", 0.2f),
+ RESTAURANT("Restaurant", 0.6f),
+ ENTERTAINMENT("Entertainment", 0.8f),
+ SHOPPING("Shopping", 0.9f),
+ FASHION("Fashion", 0.9f),
+ ELECTRONICS("Electronics", 1.0f),
+ SUBSCRIPTION("Subscription Service", 0.7f),
+ TRANSPORTATION("Transportation", 0.3f),
+ HEALTHCARE("Healthcare", 0.1f),
+ EDUCATION("Education", 0.2f),
+ UNKNOWN("Unknown", 0.5f)
+}
+
+enum class RiskLevel(val displayName: String, val color: androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color) {
+ LOW("Low Risk", androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color.Green),
+ MEDIUM("Medium Risk", androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color(0xFFFFA500)), // Orange
+ HIGH("High Risk", androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color.Red),
+ VERY_HIGH("Very High Risk", androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color(0xFF8B0000)) // Dark Red
+}
+
+// Mock AI service for demonstration (replace with actual AI service)
+data class OpenAIRequest(
+ val model: String = "gpt-3.5-turbo",
+ val messages: List<OpenAIMessage>,
+ @SerializedName("max_tokens") val maxTokens: Int = 500,
+ val temperature: Float = 0.7f
+)
+
+data class OpenAIMessage(
+ val role: String,
+ val content: String
+)
+
+data class OpenAIResponse(
+ val choices: List<OpenAIChoice>
+)
+
+data class OpenAIChoice(
+ val message: OpenAIMessage
+)

impulsive.", "code_edit": "package com.example.fintechspender.ai\n\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.delay\nimport java.text.SimpleDateFormat\nimport java.util.*\n\nclass AITransactionAnalyzer {\n \n // Mock merchant database - in real implementation, this would be from a comprehensive database\n private val merchantDatabase = mapOf(\n // Shopping & Fashion\n \"amazon\" to MerchantType.SHOPPING,\n \"flipkart\" to MerchantType.SHOPPING,\n \"myntra\" to MerchantType.FASHION,\n \"ajio\" to MerchantType.FASHION,\n \"nykaa\" to MerchantType.FASHION,\n \"zara\" to MerchantType.FASHION,\n \"h&m\" to MerchantType.FASHION,\n \n // Electronics\n \"croma\" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,\n \"reliance digital\" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,\n \"samsung\" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,\n \"apple\" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,\n \n // Entertainment\n \"bookmyshow\" to MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT,\n \"netflix\" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,\n \"spotify\" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,\n \"prime video\" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,\n \"hotstar\" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,\n \"pvr cinemas\" to MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT,\n \"inox\" to MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT,\n \n // Food & Restaurants\n \"swiggy\" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,\n \"zomato\" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,\n \"dominos\" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,\n \"mcdonald\" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,\n \"kfc\" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,\n \"starbucks\" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,\n \"cafe coffee day\" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,\n \n // Grocery\n \"big basket\" to MerchantType.GROCERY,\n \"grofers\" to MerchantType.GROCERY,\n \"reliance fresh\" to MerchantType.GROCERY,\n \"spencer's\" to MerchantType.GROCERY,\n \"dmart\" to MerchantType.GROCERY,\n \n // Transportation\n \"uber\" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,\n \"ola\" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,\n \"rapido\" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,\n \"irctc\" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,\n \"redbus\" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,\n \n // Healthcare\n \"apollo pharmacy\" to MerchantType.HEALTHCARE,\n \"netmeds\" to MerchantType.HEALTHCARE,\n \"pharmeasy\" to MerchantType.HEALTHCARE,\n \n // Education\n \"byju's\" to MerchantType.EDUCATION,\n \"unacademy\" to MerchantType.EDUCATION,\n \"coursera\" to MerchantType.EDUCATION\n )\n \n suspend fun analyzeTransaction(request: TransactionAnalysisRequest): TransactionAnalysisResponse {\n // Simulate AI processing delay\n delay(1000)\n \n val merchantType = detectMerchantType(request.merchantName)\n val impulsiveScore = calculateImpulsiveScore(request, merchantType)\n val riskLevel = determineRiskLevel(impulsiveScore, merchantType)\n val questions = generateContextualQuestions(merchantType, request)\n val reasoning = generateReasoning(request, merchantType, impulsiveScore)\n val alternatives = generateAlternatives(merchantType, request)\n \n return TransactionAnalysisResponse(\n isImpulsive = impulsiveScore > 0.6f,\n impulsiveScore = impulsiveScore,\n merchantType = merchantType,\n riskLevel = riskLevel,\n questions = questions,\n reasoning = reasoning,\n alternatives = alternatives\n )\n }\n \n private fun detectMerchantType(merchantName: String): MerchantType {\n val lowercaseName = merchantName.lowercase()\n \n // Direct match\n merchantDatabase[lowercaseName]?.let { return it }\n \n // Partial match\n for ((key, type) in merchantDatabase) {\n if (lowercaseName.contains(key) || key.contains(lowercaseName)) {\n return type\n }\n }\n \n // Pattern-based detection\n return when {\n lowercaseName.contains(\"restaurant\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"cafe\") || \n lowercaseName.contains(\"food\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"pizza\") ||\n lowercaseName.contains(\"burger\") -> MerchantType.RESTAURANT\n \n lowercaseName.contains(\"mall\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"store\") ||\n lowercaseName.contains(\"shop\") -> MerchantType.SHOPPING\n \n lowercaseName.contains(\"electronics\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"mobile\") ||\n lowercaseName.contains(\"laptop\") -> MerchantType.ELECTRONICS\n \n lowercaseName.contains(\"cinema\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"movie\") ||\n lowercaseName.contains(\"game\") -> MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT\n \n lowercaseName.contains(\"medical\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"hospital\") ||\n lowercaseName.contains(\"pharmacy\") -> MerchantType.HEALTHCARE\n \n lowercaseName.contains(\"taxi\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"transport\") ||\n lowercaseName.contains(\"fuel\") || lowercaseName.contains(\"petrol\") -> MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION\n \n else -> MerchantType.UNKNOWN\n }\n }\n \n private fun calculateImpulsiveScore(request: TransactionAnalysisRequest, merchantType: MerchantType): Float {\n var score = 0f\n \n // Base score from merchant type\n score += merchantType.riskMultiplier * 0.4f\n \n // Amount relative to budget\n val budgetPercentage = request.amount / request.userBudget\n score += when {\n budgetPercentage > 0.5f -> 0.4f\n budgetPercentage > 0.3f -> 0.25f\n budgetPercentage > 0.2f -> 0.15f\n else -> 0.05f\n }\n \n // Time-based factors\n val currentHour = SimpleDateFormat(\"HH\", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date()).toInt()\n score += when {\n currentHour in 22..23 || currentHour in 0..6 -> 0.2f // Late night/early morning\n currentHour in 19..21 -> 0.1f // Evening\n else -> 0f\n }\n \n // Weekend factor\n val calendar = Calendar.getInstance()\n val dayOfWeek = calendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK)\n if (dayOfWeek == Calendar.SATURDAY || dayOfWeek == Calendar.SUNDAY) {\n score += 0.1f\n }\n \n // Recent transaction frequency\n val recentSimilarTransactions = request.recentTransactions.count { \n it.lowercase().contains(request.merchantName.lowercase()) \n }\n score += (recentSimilarTransactions * 0.05f).coerceAtMost(0.15f)\n \n return score.coerceIn(0f, 1f)\n }\n \n private fun determineRiskLevel(impulsiveScore: Float, merchantType: MerchantType): RiskLevel {\n return when {\n impulsiveScore >= 0.8f -> RiskLevel.VERY_HIGH\n impulsiveScore >= 0.6f -> RiskLevel.HIGH\n +package com.example.fintechspender.ai
 
+import kotlinx.coroutines.delay
+import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
+import java.util.*
+
+class AITransactionAnalyzer {
+
+ // Mock merchant database - in real implementation, this would be from a comprehensive database
+ private val merchantDatabase = mapOf(
+ // Shopping & Fashion
+ "amazon" to MerchantType.SHOPPING,
+ "flipkart" to MerchantType.SHOPPING,
+ "myntra" to MerchantType.FASHION,
+ "ajio" to MerchantType.FASHION,
+ "nykaa" to MerchantType.FASHION,
+ "zara" to MerchantType.FASHION,
+ "h&m" to MerchantType.FASHION,
+
+ // Electronics
+ "croma" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,
+ "reliance digital" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,
+ "samsung" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,
+ "apple" to MerchantType.ELECTRONICS,
+
+ // Entertainment
+ "bookmyshow" to MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT,
+ "netflix" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,
+ "spotify" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,
+ "prime video" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,
+ "hotstar" to MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION,
+ "pvr cinemas" to MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT,
+ "inox" to MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT,
+
+ // Food & Restaurants
+ "swiggy" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,
+ "zomato" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,
+ "dominos" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,
+ "mcdonald" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,
+ "kfc" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,
+ "starbucks" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,
+ "cafe coffee day" to MerchantType.RESTAURANT,
+
+ // Grocery
+ "big basket" to MerchantType.GROCERY,
+ "grofers" to MerchantType.GROCERY,
+ "reliance fresh" to MerchantType.GROCERY,
+ "spencer's" to MerchantType.GROCERY,
+ "dmart" to MerchantType.GROCERY,
+
+ // Transportation
+ "uber" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,
+ "ola" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,
+ "rapido" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,
+ "irctc" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,
+ "redbus" to MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION,
+
+ // Healthcare
+ "apollo pharmacy" to MerchantType.HEALTHCARE,
+ "netmeds" to MerchantType.HEALTHCARE,
+ "pharmeasy" to MerchantType.HEALTHCARE,
+
+ // Education
+ "byju's" to MerchantType.EDUCATION,
+ "unacademy" to MerchantType.EDUCATION,
+ "coursera" to MerchantType.EDUCATION
+ )
+
+ suspend fun analyzeTransaction(request: TransactionAnalysisRequest): TransactionAnalysisResponse {
+ // Simulate AI processing delay
+ delay(1000)
+
+ val merchantType = detectMerchantType(request.merchantName)
+ val impulsiveScore = calculateImpulsiveScore(request, merchantType)
+ val riskLevel = determineRiskLevel(impulsiveScore, merchantType)
+ val questions = generateContextualQuestions(merchantType, request)
+ val reasoning = generateReasoning(request, merchantType, impulsiveScore)
+ val alternatives = generateAlternatives(merchantType, request)
+
+ return TransactionAnalysisResponse(
+ isImpulsive = impulsiveScore > 0.6f,
+ impulsiveScore = impulsiveScore,
+ merchantType = merchantType,
+ riskLevel = riskLevel,
+ questions = questions,
+ reasoning = reasoning,
+ alternatives = alternatives
+ )
+ }
+
+ private fun detectMerchantType(merchantName: String): MerchantType {
+ val lowercaseName = merchantName.lowercase()
+
+ // Direct match
+ merchantDatabase[lowercaseName]?.let { return it }
+
+ // Partial match
+ for ((key, type) in merchantDatabase) {
+ if (lowercaseName.contains(key) || key.contains(lowercaseName)) {
+ return type
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Pattern-based detection
+ return when {
+ lowercaseName.contains("restaurant") || lowercaseName.contains("cafe") ||
+ lowercaseName.contains("food") || lowercaseName.contains("pizza") ||
+ lowercaseName.contains("burger") -> MerchantType.RESTAURANT
+
+ lowercaseName.contains("mall") || lowercaseName.contains("store") ||
+ lowercaseName.contains("shop") -> MerchantType.SHOPPING
+
+ lowercaseName.contains("electronics") || lowercaseName.contains("mobile") ||
+ lowercaseName.contains("laptop") -> MerchantType.ELECTRONICS
+
+ lowercaseName.contains("cinema") || lowercaseName.contains("movie") ||
+ lowercaseName.contains("game") -> MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT
+
+ lowercaseName.contains("medical") || lowercaseName.contains("hospital") ||
+ lowercaseName.contains("pharmacy") -> MerchantType.HEALTHCARE
+
+ lowercaseName.contains("taxi") || lowercaseName.contains("transport") ||
+ lowercaseName.contains("fuel") || lowercaseName.contains("petrol") -> MerchantType.TRANSPORTATION
+
+ else -> MerchantType.UNKNOWN
+ }
+ }
+
+ private fun calculateImpulsiveScore(
+ request: TransactionAnalysisRequest,
+ merchantType: MerchantType
+ ): Float {
+ var score = 0f
+
+ // Base score from merchant type
+ score += merchantType.riskMultiplier * 0.4f
+
+ // Amount relative to budget
+ val budgetPercentage = request.amount / request.userBudget
+ score += when {
+ budgetPercentage > 0.5f -> 0.4f
+ budgetPercentage > 0.3f -> 0.25f
+ budgetPercentage > 0.2f -> 0.15f
+ else -> 0.05f
+ }
+
+ // Time-based factors
+ val currentHour = SimpleDateFormat("HH", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date()).toInt()
+ score += when {
+ currentHour in 22..23 || currentHour in 0..6 -> 0.2f // Late night/early morning
+ currentHour in 19..21 -> 0.1f // Evening
+ else -> 0f
+ }
+
+ // Weekend factor
+ val calendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+ val dayOfWeek = calendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK)
+ if (dayOfWeek == Calendar.SATURDAY || dayOfWeek == Calendar.SUNDAY) {
+ score += 0.1f
+ }
+
+ // Recent transaction frequency
+ val recentSimilarTransactions = request.recentTransactions.count {
+ it.lowercase().contains(request.merchantName.lowercase())
+ }
+ score += (recentSimilarTransactions * 0.05f).coerceAtMost(0.15f)
+
+ return score.coerceIn(0f, 1f)
+ }
+
+ private fun determineRiskLevel(impulsiveScore: Float, merchantType: MerchantType): RiskLevel {
+ return when {
+ impulsiveScore >= 0.8f -> RiskLevel.VERY_HIGH
+ impulsiveScore >= 0.6f -> RiskLevel.HIGH
+ impulsiveScore >= 0.4f -> RiskLevel.MEDIUM
+ else -> RiskLevel.LOW
+ }
+ }
+
+ private fun generateContextualQuestions(
+ merchantType: MerchantType,
+ request: TransactionAnalysisRequest
+ ): List<AIQuestion> {
+ val questions = mutableListOf<AIQuestion>()
+
+ // Common questions for all high-risk transactions
+ if (request.amount > request.userBudget * 0.3f) {
+ questions.add(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "This expense is ${
+ String.format(
+ "%.1f",
+ (request.amount / request.userBudget) * 100
+ )
+ }% of your budget. Have you considered if this is truly necessary right now?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes, it's necessary", "No, I can wait")
+ )
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Merchant-specific questions
+ when (merchantType) {
+ MerchantType.FASHION -> {
+ questions.addAll(
+ listOf(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Do you already own something similar to what you're buying?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes", "No")
+ ),
+ AIQuestion(
+ "When do you plan to wear/use this item?",
+ QuestionType.MULTIPLE_CHOICE,
+ listOf(
+ "Within a week",
+ "Within a month",
+ "Not sure",
+ "Special occasion"
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ }
+
+ MerchantType.RESTAURANT -> {
+ questions.addAll(
+ listOf(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Do you have food at home that you could eat instead?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes", "No")
+ ),
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Is this for a special occasion or just convenience?",
+ QuestionType.MULTIPLE_CHOICE,
+ listOf(
+ "Special occasion",
+ "Convenience",
+ "Social gathering",
+ "No other option"
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ }
+
+ MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT -> {
+ questions.addAll(
+ listOf(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Have you already spent on entertainment this week?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes", "No")
+ ),
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Could you enjoy a free alternative instead?",
+ QuestionType.TEXT_INPUT,
+ null
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ }
+
+ MerchantType.ELECTRONICS -> {
+ questions.addAll(
+ listOf(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Is your current device/item broken or malfunctioning?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes, it's broken", "No, it works fine")
+ ),
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Have you researched if this is the best price available?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes, I've compared prices", "No, I haven't checked")
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ }
+
+ MerchantType.SHOPPING -> {
+ questions.addAll(
+ listOf(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Was this item on your planned shopping list?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes, it was planned", "No, it's spontaneous")
+ ),
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Can you wait 24 hours before making this purchase?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes, I can wait", "No, I need it now")
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ }
+
+ MerchantType.SUBSCRIPTION -> {
+ questions.addAll(
+ listOf(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "How often do you actually use this service?",
+ QuestionType.MULTIPLE_CHOICE,
+ listOf("Daily", "Weekly", "Monthly", "Rarely")
+ ),
+ AIQuestion(
+ "Do you have similar subscriptions that you could cancel instead?",
+ QuestionType.YES_NO,
+ listOf("Yes", "No")
+ )
+ )
+ )
+ }
+
+ else -> {
+ questions.add(
+ AIQuestion(
+ "On a scale of 1-10, how much do you really need this right now?",
+ QuestionType.MULTIPLE_CHOICE,
+ listOf("1-3 (Want)", "4-6 (Useful)", "7-8 (Need)", "9-10 (Urgent)")
+ )
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ return questions
+ }
+
+ private fun generateReasoning(
+ request: TransactionAnalysisRequest,
+ merchantType: MerchantType,
+ impulsiveScore: Float
+ ): String {
+ val reasons = mutableListOf<String>()
+
+ if (request.amount > request.userBudget * 0.5f) {
+ reasons.add(
+ "This expense represents a significant portion (${
+ String.format(
+ "%.1f",
+ (request.amount / request.userBudget) * 100
+ )
+ }%) of your budget"
+ )
+ }
+
+ if (merchantType.riskMultiplier > 0.7f) {
+ reasons.add("${merchantType.displayName} purchases are often associated with impulse buying")
+ }
+
+ val currentHour = SimpleDateFormat("HH", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date()).toInt()
+ if (currentHour >= 22 || currentHour <= 6) {
+ reasons.add("Late-night purchases are more likely to be impulsive")
+ }
+
+ return if (reasons.isNotEmpty()) {
+ " Potential impulse buy detected. ${reasons.joinToString(". ")}."
+ } else {
+ " This appears to be a reasonable purchase based on the analysis."
+ }
+ }
+
+ private fun generateAlternatives(
+ merchantType: MerchantType,
+ request: TransactionAnalysisRequest
+ ): List<String> {
+ return when (merchantType) {
+ MerchantType.RESTAURANT -> listOf(
+ "Cook a meal at home",
+ "Order from a less expensive restaurant",
+ "Share a meal with someone",
+ "Look for discount coupons or offers"
+ )
+
+ MerchantType.FASHION -> listOf(
+ "Check your existing wardrobe first",
+ "Wait for a sale or discount",
+ "Consider buying from a thrift store",
+ "Borrow from a friend for special occasions"
+ )
+
+ MerchantType.ENTERTAINMENT -> listOf(
+ "Watch free content on YouTube or other platforms",
+ "Visit a public park or free event",
+ "Spend time with friends at home",
+ "Read a book from the library"
+ )
+
+ MerchantType.ELECTRONICS -> listOf(
+ "Wait for upcoming sales or festivals",
+ "Consider refurbished or older models",
+ "Check if your current device can be repaired",
+ "Look for better deals online"
+ )
+
+ else -> listOf(
+ "Sleep on it and decide tomorrow",
+ "Set aside money for this purchase over time",
+ "Look for discounts or better deals",
+ "Consider if you really need this now"
+ )
+ }
+ }

+package com.example.fintechspender.ai
 
+import androidx.compose.animation.animateColorAsState
+import androidx.compose.animation.core.LinearEasing
+import androidx.compose.animation.core.RepeatMode
+import androidx.compose.animation.core.animateFloat
+import androidx.compose.animation.core.infiniteRepeatable
+import androidx.compose.animation.core.rememberInfiniteTransition
+import androidx.compose.animation.core.tween
+import androidx.compose.foundation.background
+import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
+import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn

+import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Psychology
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Store
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Warning

+
+@Composable
+fun AITransactionAnalysisDialog(
+ merchantName: String,
+ amount: Float,
+ userBudget: Float,
+ recentTransactions: List<String>,
+ aiAnalyzer: AITransactionAnalyzer,
+ onDismiss: () -> Unit,
+ onApprove: () -> Unit,
+ onEmergencyClick: () -> Unit
+) {
+ var analysisState by remember { mutableStateOf<AnalysisState>(AnalysisState.Loading) }
+ var currentQuestionIndex by remember { mutableIntStateOf(0) }
+ var userAnswers by remember { mutableStateOf<Map<Int, String>>(emptyMap()) }
+
+ val scope = rememberCoroutineScope()
+
+ // Start analysis when dialog opens
+ LaunchedEffect(merchantName, amount) {
+ scope.launch {
+ try {
+ val request = TransactionAnalysisRequest(
+ merchantName = merchantName,
+ amount = amount,
+ userBudget = userBudget,
+ recentTransactions = recentTransactions,
+ timeOfDay = java.text.SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm", Locale.getDefault())
+ .format(java.util.Date()),
+ dayOfWeek = java.text.SimpleDateFormat("EEEE", Locale.getDefault())
+ .format(java.util.Date())
+ )
+
+ val response = aiAnalyzer.analyzeTransaction(request)
+ analysisState = AnalysisState.Success(response)
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ analysisState = AnalysisState.Error(e.message ?: "Analysis failed")
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ AlertDialog(
+ onDismissRequest = onDismiss,
+ title = {
+ Row(
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Psychology,
+ contentDescription = "AI Analysis",
+ tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
+ )
+ Text("AI Transaction Analysis")
+ }
+ },
+ text = {
+ when (val state = analysisState) {
+ is AnalysisState.Loading -> {
+ LoadingAnalysisContent()
+ }
+
+ is AnalysisState.Success -> {
+ if (state.response.questions.isEmpty()) {
+ // No questions needed, show summary
+ AnalysisSummaryContent(state.response)
+ } else {
+ // Show questions one by one
+ QuestionContent(
+ analysis = state.response,
+ questionIndex = currentQuestionIndex,
+ userAnswers = userAnswers,
+ onAnswerSelected = { answer ->
+ userAnswers = userAnswers + (currentQuestionIndex to answer)
+ },
+ onAnswerCleared = {
+ userAnswers = userAnswers - currentQuestionIndex
+ }
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ is AnalysisState.Error -> {
+ ErrorContent(state.message)
+ }
+ }
+ },
+ confirmButton = {
+ when (val state = analysisState) {
+ is AnalysisState.Loading -> {
+ // No button during loading
+ }
+
+ is AnalysisState.Success -> {
+ if (state.response.questions.isEmpty()) {
+ // No questions, direct approval based on risk
+ if (state.response.riskLevel == RiskLevel.LOW) {
+ Button(onClick = onApprove) {
+ Text("Proceed with Transaction")
+ }
+ }
+ } else {
+ // Handle question navigation
+ val currentAnswer = userAnswers[currentQuestionIndex]
+ val canProceed = currentAnswer != null
+
+ Button(
+ onClick = {
+ if (currentQuestionIndex < state.response.questions.size - 1) {
+ currentQuestionIndex++
+ } else {
+ // All questions answered, evaluate responses
+ val shouldApprove =
+ evaluateAnswers(userAnswers, state.response.questions)
+ if (shouldApprove) {
+ onApprove()
+ } else {
+ onDismiss()
+ }
+ }
+ },
+ enabled = canProceed
+ ) {
+ Text(
+ if (currentQuestionIndex < state.response.questions.size - 1)
+ "Next Question"
+ else
+ "Complete Analysis"
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ is AnalysisState.Error -> {
+ Button(onClick = onApprove) {
+ Text("Proceed Anyway")
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ },
+ dismissButton = {
+ Row(horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)) {
+ TextButton(onClick = onDismiss) {
+ Text("Cancel Transaction")
+ }
+ if (analysisState is AnalysisState.Success) {
+ TextButton(onClick = onEmergencyClick) {
+ Text("Emergency")
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ )
+}
+
+@Composable
+private fun LoadingAnalysisContent() {
+ val infiniteTransition = rememberInfiniteTransition(label = "loading")
+ val alpha by infiniteTransition.animateFloat(
+ initialValue = 0.3f,
+ targetValue = 1f,
+ animationSpec = infiniteRepeatable(
+ animation = tween(1000, easing = LinearEasing),
+ repeatMode = RepeatMode.Reverse
+ ),
+ label = "alpha"
+ )
+
+ Column(
+ horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Psychology,
+ contentDescription = "Analyzing",
+ modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
+ tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary.copy(alpha = alpha)
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
+ Text(
+ "Analyzing transaction...",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyLarge,
+ textAlign = TextAlign.Center
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(8.dp))
+ Text(
+ " Detecting merchant type\n Calculating impulse score\n Generating contextual questions",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall,
+ textAlign = TextAlign.Center,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
+ LinearProgressIndicator(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth())
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+private fun AnalysisSummaryContent(analysis: TransactionAnalysisResponse) {
+ LazyColumn(
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
+ modifier = Modifier.height(300.dp)
+ ) {
+ item {
+ // Merchant info card
+ Card(
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
+ containerColor = analysis.riskLevel.color.copy(alpha = 0.1f)
+ )
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(12.dp),
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Store,
+ contentDescription = "Merchant",
+ tint = analysis.riskLevel.color
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.width(8.dp))
+ Column {
+ Text(
+ analysis.merchantType.displayName,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
+ )
+ Text(
+ analysis.riskLevel.displayName,
+ color = analysis.riskLevel.color,
+ fontSize = 12.sp
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ item {
+ // Impulse score
+ Card {
+ Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(12.dp)) {
+ Text("Impulse Score", fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold)
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ LinearProgressIndicator(
+ progress = { analysis.impulsiveScore },
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ color = when {
+ analysis.impulsiveScore > 0.7f -> Color.Red
+ analysis.impulsiveScore > 0.4f -> Color(0xFFFFA500)
+ else -> Color.Green
+ }
+ )
+ Text(
+ "${(analysis.impulsiveScore * 100).toInt()}% likely to be impulsive",
+ fontSize = 12.sp,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ item {
+ // Reasoning
+ Card {
+ Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(12.dp)) {
+ Text("Analysis", fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold)
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ Text(
+ analysis.reasoning,
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ if (analysis.alternatives.isNotEmpty()) {
+ item {
+ Card {
+ Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(12.dp)) {
+ Text("Alternatives to Consider", fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold)
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ analysis.alternatives.forEach { alternative ->
+ Text(
+ " $alternative",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall,
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(vertical = 2.dp)
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+private fun QuestionContent(
+ analysis: TransactionAnalysisResponse,
+ questionIndex: Int,
+ userAnswers: Map<Int, String>,
+ onAnswerSelected: (String) -> Unit,
+ onAnswerCleared: () -> Unit
+) {
+ val question = analysis.questions[questionIndex]
+ val currentAnswer = userAnswers[questionIndex]
+
+ Column {
+ // Progress indicator
+ LinearProgressIndicator(
+ progress = { (questionIndex + 1f) / analysis.questions.size },
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ )
+
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
+
+ // Merchant info
+ Row(
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .clip(RoundedCornerShape(8.dp))
+ .background(analysis.riskLevel.color.copy(alpha = 0.1f))
+ .padding(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Store,
+ contentDescription = "Merchant",
+ tint = analysis.riskLevel.color
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.width(8.dp))
+ Column {
+ Text(
+ analysis.merchantType.displayName,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ fontSize = 14.sp
+ )
+ Text(
+ analysis.riskLevel.displayName,
+ color = analysis.riskLevel.color,
+ fontSize = 12.sp
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
+
+ // Question
+ Text(
+ "Question ${questionIndex + 1} of ${analysis.questions.size}",
+ fontSize = 12.sp,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ Text(
+ question.questionText,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyLarge
+ )
+
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
+
+ // Answer options
+ when (question.questionType) {
+ QuestionType.YES_NO, QuestionType.MULTIPLE_CHOICE -> {
+ question.expectedAnswers?.forEach { option ->
+ val isSelected = currentAnswer == option
+ OutlinedButton(
+ onClick = {
+ if (isSelected) {
+ onAnswerCleared()
+ } else {
+ onAnswerSelected(option)
+ }
+ },
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ colors = ButtonDefaults.outlinedButtonColors(
+ containerColor = if (isSelected)
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary.copy(alpha = 0.1f)
+ else
+ Color.Transparent
+ )
+ ) {
+ Text(option)
+ }
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(8.dp))
+ }
+ }
+
+ QuestionType.TEXT_INPUT -> {
+ OutlinedTextField(
+ value = currentAnswer ?: "",
+ onValueChange = onAnswerSelected,
+ label = { Text("Your answer") },
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ )
+ }
+
+ QuestionType.REFLECTION -> {
+ OutlinedTextField(
+ value = currentAnswer ?: "",
+ onValueChange = onAnswerSelected,
+ label = { Text("Take a moment to reflect...") },
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ minLines = 3
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+private fun ErrorContent(message: String) {
+ Column(
+ horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Warning,
+ contentDescription = "Error",
+ modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
+ tint = Color.Red
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(16.dp))
+ Text(
+ "Analysis Error",
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = Color.Red
+ )
+ Spacer(Modifier.height(8.dp))
+ Text(
+ message,
+ textAlign = TextAlign.Center,
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall
+ )
+ }
+}
+
+private fun evaluateAnswers(userAnswers: Map<Int, String>, questions: List<AIQuestion>): Boolean {
+ // Simple evaluation logic - in real implementation, this would be more sophisticated
+ var positiveAnswers = 0
+
+ userAnswers.forEach { (questionIndex, answer) ->
+ val question = questions.getOrNull(questionIndex)
+ question?.let {
+ // Score based on answer content
+ when {
+ answer.contains("yes", ignoreCase = true) &&
+ question.questionText.contains(
+ "necessary",
+ ignoreCase = true
+ ) -> positiveAnswers++
+
+ answer.contains("no", ignoreCase = true) &&
+ (question.questionText.contains("already own", ignoreCase = true) ||
+ question.questionText.contains(
+ "food at home",
+ ignoreCase = true
+ )) -> positiveAnswers++
+
+ answer.contains("within a week", ignoreCase = true) ||
+ answer.contains("special occasion", ignoreCase = true) -> positiveAnswers++
+
+ answer.contains("broken", ignoreCase = true) ||
+ answer.contains("compared prices", ignoreCase = true) -> positiveAnswers++
+
+ answer.contains("planned", ignoreCase = true) -> positiveAnswers++
+
+ // High need scores
+ answer.contains("7-8", ignoreCase = true) ||
+ answer.contains("9-10", ignoreCase = true) -> positiveAnswers++
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Approve if more than half the answers indicate genuine need
+ return positiveAnswers >= (userAnswers.size / 2.0)
+}
+
+sealed class AnalysisState {
+ object Loading : AnalysisState()
+ data class Success(val response: TransactionAnalysisResponse) : AnalysisState()
+ data class Error(val message: String) : AnalysisState()
+}

- "budget" in userInput.lowercase() -> "A budget helps you track your income and expenses. It's a great tool for managing your money!"
- "saving" in userInput.lowercase() -> "Saving money is important for future goals and emergencies. Try to set aside a portion of your income regularly."
- "debt" in userInput.lowercase() -> "Debt can be managed by paying off high-interest loans first. Creating a repayment plan is a good first step."
- "invest" in userInput.lowercase() -> "Investing can help your money grow over time. Consider a diversified portfolio to manage risk."
- else -> "I'm still learning, but I can help with topics like budgeting, saving, debt, and investing. Try asking about one of those!"
+ "budget" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "A budget is your financial roadmap! It helps you plan where every rupee goes. Try the 50-30-20 rule: 50% for needs, 30% for wants, and 20% for savings. Would you like help setting up your budget?"
+ }
+
+ "saving" in userInput.lowercase() || "save" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Great question about saving! Start small - even 100/month adds up. Use automated transfers to make it easier. Emergency fund first (3-6 months expenses), then goals like vacation or gadgets!"
+ }
+
+ "debt" in userInput.lowercase() || "loan" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Debt management is crucial! Use the snowball method: pay minimums on all debts, then put extra money toward the smallest debt. Or try avalanche method - tackle highest interest rates first."
+ }
+
+ "invest" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Investing helps your money grow! For beginners, consider SIP in mutual funds. Start with equity funds for long-term goals (5+ years) and debt funds for short-term. Always diversify!"
+ }
+
+ "emergency" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Emergency funds are your financial safety net! Aim for 3-6 months of expenses in a savings account. This covers unexpected costs like medical bills or job loss without deriving debt."
+ }
+
+ "credit card" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Credit cards can be helpful if used wisely! Always pay full amount by due date to avoid interest. Use for rewards and building credit score, but never spend more than you can afford."
+ }
+
+ "mutual fund" in userInput.lowercase() || "sip" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "SIPs in mutual funds are perfect for beginners! They average out market volatility and build discipline. Start with diversified equity funds for wealth creation over 5+ years."
+ }
+
+ "tax" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Tax planning saves money! Use Section 80C (ELSS, PPF, insurance) for 1.5L deduction. Section 80D for health insurance. Start early in the financial year for better planning."
+ }
+
+ "insurance" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Insurance protects your finances! Term life insurance (10-15x annual income) and health insurance are must-haves. Avoid mixing insurance with investment unless necessary."
+ }
+
+ "expense" in userInput.lowercase() || "spending" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Track your expenses to understand spending patterns! Use the 24-hour rule for non-essential purchases above 1000. Categorize: needs vs wants. This app helps with that!"
+ }
+
+ "goal" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Financial goals give direction! Set SMART goals: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound. Short-term (1 year), medium-term (3-5 years), long-term (5+ years)."
+ }
+
+ "retirement" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Start retirement planning early! Power of compounding works best with time. Contribute to EPF, PPF, and SIP in equity mutual funds. Target 25-30x annual expenses by retirement."
+ }
+
+ "impulsive" in userInput.lowercase() || "impulse" in userInput.lowercase() -> {
+ "Impulse buying is common! This app's AI helps identify such purchases. Use the 24-hour rule, unsubscribe from shopping apps, and ask 'Do I really need this?' before buying."
+ }
+
+ userInput.lowercase().contains("hello") || userInput.lowercase().contains("hi") -> {
+ "Hello! I'm your AI financial assistant. I can help with budgeting, saving, investing, debt management, and more. What financial topic interests you today?"
+ }
+
+ userInput.lowercase().contains("help") -> {
+ "I'm here to help! Ask me about:\n Budgeting & expense tracking\n Saving strategies\n Investment basics\n Debt management\n Emergency funds\n Tax planning\n\nWhat would you like to know?"
+ }
+
+ else -> {
+ "That's an interesting question! I specialize in personal finance topics like budgeting, saving, investing, debt management, and expense tracking. Could you rephrase your question or ask about one of these areas?"
+ }
 }
 return ChatMessage(response, false)
```

lowercaseName.contains(\"library\") -> MerchantType.BOOKS\n```\n\n4. **Create merchant-specific questions**:\n```kotlin\nMerchantType.TRAVEL -> {\n questions.addAll(listOf(\n AIQuestion(\"Is this trip services:\n\n```kotlin\n// Example OpenAI integration\nprivate suspend fun getAIResponse(prompt: String): String {\n val request = OpenAIRequest(\n messages = listOf(\n OpenAIMessage(\"system\", \"You
